text: England competed at the 1966 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Kingston, Jamaica, from 4 - 13 August 1966. England finished at the top of the medal table. ==Medal table (top three)== The athletes that competed are listed below. ==Athletics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !width=250|
